CANDIDATE_ASSIGNED: Show Opportunities where I am Candidate
DUPLICATE_NO_CONTEXT_ACCESS: You may not have context access to do duplications of the following object(s)
TOOLTIP_ROOT_CAUSE: The root cause of the opportunity.
TOOLTIP_CONTEXT: The context for the opportunity. This can include an Enterprise Project, Project, Task or Document.
TOOLTIP_MATRIX_CONFIGURATION: The configuration connected with the context. If the context has multiple configurations, a list shows all configurations connected with the context while creating the first opportunity under that context or in the properties for an invalid opportunity created under that context.
TOOLTIP_EFFECTIVE_DATE: The date on which the opportunity becomes effective.
TOOLTIP_IMPACT: The positive impact of the opportunity. Default values are 1-Negligible, 2-Minor, 3-Moderate, 4-Major, or 5-High. You can also assign this by clicking in the Heat Map. To define other values, you can customize the Matrix Configuration.
TOOLTIP_PROBABILITY: The probability of the opportunity occurring. Default values are 1-Rare, 2-Unlikely, 3-Possible, 4-Likely, or 5-Almost Certain. You can also assign this by clicking in the Heat Map. To define other values, you can customize the Matrix Configuration.
TOOLTIP_RATING: This value is based on the values you select in Positive Impact and Probability. The heat map reflects these values.
TOOLTIP_SEVERITY: The severity is based on the entered Positive Impact and Probability. For example, using the default values, a Positive Impact of '2' and Probability of '4' results in a calculated level of 2 in the matrix configuration. Therefore, the Severity is displayed as '2-Medium'. '2' reflects the opportunity level and 'Medium' is the respective severity value.
TOOLTIP_HEATMAP: A picture of the heat map showing this opportunity's placement in the grid.
TOOLTIP_TYPE_OF: Used to classify opportunities. Values include Cost, Quality, Technical, Resource, Performance, Schedule, Benefits, Manufacturability, and Other.
TOOLTIP_MATURITY_STATE: The maturity state of the opportunity. Values are Draft, To Do, In Work, In Approval, or Completed.
TOOLTIP_ORGANIZATION: The organization this opportunity belongs to.
TOOLTIP_COLLABORATIVE_SPACE: The collaborative space in which this opportunity is created.
